TopicTitle: WATCH LIVE @ 5:30 pm ET: 'Ring of Fire' Solar Eclipse Over Australia

Articles.Content:
http://www.space.com/19195-night-sky-planets-asteroids-webcasts.html

thought ksp community would lke this share
Damn, people (and by people I mean me) in south-east australia will miss this.
It is live!!!! go now!, watch awesomeness unfold!
Thanks for the post! Had no idea this was happening today.

I'm watching it live literally right now. As in outside, projecting it on the leg of the table, with the limited equipment I could fit among my uni stuff. My set up doesn't lend itself to photography well, but have a look:

Just after doing that, I found a group from the science faculty who had a proper solar telescope, and got a much better look. It was very cool, you could even see sunspots and things.

We only had a 27% eclipse here, but that's better than nothing.
